breakdowns.description: Allows users to add new tasks with a title, description, priority, and due date; edit existing tasks; delete tasks; and mark tasks as Completed or Pending.
conditions: A new task must include title, description, priority, and due date.

breakdowns.description: Enables users to categorize tasks, filter tasks by status (All, Completed, Pending), and sort tasks by due date or priority.
conditions: Tasks can be categorized (e.g., Work, Personal, Study).
Tasks can be filtered by status: All, Completed, Pending.
Tasks can be sorted by due date or priority.
